title: AE脚本-线条拖尾MG动画效果制作脚本 Speed Lines v1.5+使用教程
author: 大众脸
content: 脚本可以根据物体运动或路径来生成任意数量的线条拖尾，还可控制线条的宽度，长度，间隔，样式等多种属性。Speed Lines for After Effects will create any number of shape layer strokes that follow your layer along a motion path. You have complete control over the stroke amount, separation, length and styling! Plus, everything can be changed, even after the script has been run.

other.script_installation: 拷贝.jsxbin脚本文件到AE安装目录下：Support Files\Scripts\ScriptUI Panels
other.v1.5_update: 更新兼容支持OS X Catalina 10.15
